an6.105:1.1: “Tayome, bhikkhave, bhava pahatabba, tisu sikkhasu sikkhitabbam.
an6.105:1.8: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ime tayo bhava pahina honti, imasu ca tisu sikkhasu sikkhitasikkho hoti—
an6.105:1.9: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu acchecchi tanham, vivattayi samyojanam, samma manabhisamaya antamakasi dukkhassa”ti.
